title: Fragment, ca. 1805
medium: Technique: Printed by engraved plate on cotton plain weave foundation.
dimensions:
Warp: 66cm (26in.). Weft: 77cm (30 1/4in.) All edges cut. two pieces seamed together correctly in the center.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 51cm (20in.).
Designed for lengths to form a straight repeat when sewn together
description: Circular and oval cartouches containing goddesses and decorative ornament on a background of scalloped lines. In blue on white.
